# Revitalize Legacy, Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]], [[5th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your legacy item; see text

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until expended

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Weapons of Legacy (WotC), pg. 17

This spell functions like *[[Revitalize Legacy, Least (Spell)|least revitalize legacy]]*, except that you regain one daily use of a chosen lesser ability.
